mapper.insert: INSERT INTO film(title, description, release_year, language_id, original_language_id, rental_duration, rental_rate, length, replacement_cost, rating, special_features, last_update) VALUES ('ACADEMY DINOSAUR','A Epic Drama of a Feminist And a Mad Scientist who must Battle a Teacher in The Canadian Rockies',2006,1,NULL,6,'0.99',86,'20.99','PG','Deleted Scenes,Behind the Scenes','2006-02-15 05:03:42');
